about.title: About Us
about.heading: Delicious and Healthy
about.paragraph1: At PUPUSERIA MI BENDICIÓN, we bring you authentic Salvadoran pupusas made with fresh, organic ingredients. Each pupusa is handcrafted with care, using traditional recipes and the finest quality ingredients. Our commitment is to serve healthy, delicious food that nourishes both body and soul.
about.paragraph2: We offer a variety of options including vegan, vegetarian, and gluten-free pupusas, ensuring everyone can enjoy our authentic flavors. Our daily rotating menu features fresh sides, traditional breakfast plates, and specialty items—all made with the same dedication to quality and health.
